code:
flowchart TD
  Sensor --> MCU[MCU / ESP32]
  MCU --> TinyML[TinyML Classifier]
  TinyML --> SleepController[Sleep Controller]
  SleepController -->|sleep/wake| DeepSleep[Deep Sleep (RTC)]
  SleepController -->|uplink| Radio[Radio TX]
  Radio --> Gateway[Gateway / Broker]
  Gateway --> Cloud[Training & Storage]
  Cloud --> Trainer[Simulator/Trainer]
  Trainer -->|policy artifact| MCU
